thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: shura

author: shura
title: shura
text: I love this site. It never fails I come away with treasures at prices no one can beat. I used to run to amazon for all things but no more. You can't beat the free shipping or the bonus $5 off that's easy to earn because you'll order over and over. I also like that these are used books. I feel like I'm helping out the environment. Love Thriftbooks.com!!! Start here first. You won't be disappointed.
